(Seed) Advanced Botanicals Facial Toner, Cucumber

Brand: (seed)

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Aqua (Water), Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Distillate, Cucumis Sativus (Cucumber) Fruit Extract, Glycerin, Sodium Benzoate, Gluconolactone.

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Allergies &
Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
